resources.string: #VerseOfTheDay: \"And hold fast, all of you together, to the Rope of Allah and be not divided among yourselves…\" (3:103)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"O mankind, there has come to you instruction from your Lord and healing for what is in the breasts…\" (10:57)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"… truly it is in the remembrance of Allah that hearts find peace.\" (13:28)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"We have, without doubt, sent down the Qur\'an; and We will assuredly guard it.\" (15:9)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"So when you recite the Qur\'an, seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the expelled.\" (16:98)
#VerseOfTheDay: \"And We have certainly made the Qur\'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?\" (54:17)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"The example of a believer who recites the Qur\'an regularly is like that of a citrus fruit, it has a good taste and a good fragrance.\" (Al-Bukhari)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"The best of you are those who learn the Qur\'an and teach it.\" (Al-Bukhari)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"It will be said to the companion of the Qur\'an: \'Recite and rise in status, recite as you used to recite in the world…\'\" (Al-Tirmidhi)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"Whoever recites a letter from the Book of Allah, he will be credited with a good deed…\" (Al-Tirmidhi)
#HadithOfTheDay: \"The people of the Qur\'an are the people of Allah and His special servants.\" (Al-Nasa\'i)
#QuoteOfTheDay: \"If your hearts were truly pure, you would not have enough of reciting the Qur\'an…\" (Uthman ibn Affan)
#QuoteOfTheDay: \"… I do not like for one day and night to pass by except that I have to look at the book of Allah.\" (Uthman ibn Affan)
